long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drop anything seamlessly and securely from your Cove Identity phone App to a desktop, be it one-time passwords, your important documents.

This extension securely pairs to the Cove Identity App, which can be downloaded through https://coveidentity.com/

You can drop your 2FA directly to the web form and auto-fill in the real-time.
